title: Confederation of Industry: Recommendations for a restart
title_national_language: Svaz průmyslu a dopravy ČR: Doporučení pro restart ekonomiky
category: Promoting the economic, labour market and social recovery
background_info_description: The Confederation of Industry of the Czech Republic [Svaz průmyslu a dopravy České republiky (http://www.spcr.cz)], SP ČR has presented Recommendations for a restart and the long-term renewal of growth of the Czech economy. SP ČR has set up an expert group, which has developed ten measures which, if being applied by the Czech government, can contribute to the rapid renewal of the economy's potential for long-term growth.
content_of_measure_description: The document presents measures which could help to restart Czech economy after the COVID-19 pandemic. Among most important are the following:* Business R&D must be a government priority,* Promoting investment and demand by ensuring sufficient funds for the construction and renewal of transport and data infrastructure, availability of financial instruments such as guarantees and state loans etc.* Structural reforms are also necessary - the economy will not be saved by direct support in the form of subsidies, social programs and guarantees, the best way for future prosperity and sustainable development are innovations, educated and skilled workforce, flexible labour market, digital transformation, especially in public services and integration to the world economy.* water management, climate protection and circular economy are also challenges for the long term growth.The whole document is also available in English.
involvement_of_social_partners_descripti: SP ČR has prepared the document itself.

Login                                                                                                                                            	                                                                                                	SP ČR	News                                                                                            		            Recommendations for a restart of the Czech economy 																2020-08-04										Confederation of Industry of the Czech Republic is very well aware that the consequences of the coronavirus crisis will be significant for companies and the entire economy. Thus, we have set up an expert group, which has developed ten measures which being applied by the Czech government can contribute to the rapid renewal of the economy's potential for long-term growth.Based on recent development we react the same way as partner industrial associations throughout Europe. Because only subsidies, social programs or soft loans will not return the economy to pre-crisis growth and long-term prosperity. In the below presented document we focus primarily on supporting investment, innovation, digital transformation, but also on education reform and better functioning of the labour market or simplification and transparency of regulation.You can read all the recommendations here.		    															section Aktuálně							                        		                back                    Share article:            	                    Twitter                	                    LinkedIn                	E-mail	Print            Return to Top                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      		Contacts                                                                                                                      © Copyright                    2021                                            Confederation of Industry of the Czech Republic                                                      					                                                    | spcr@spcr.cz                                | created by Artio s.r.o.
